I am Nduka Boika, a Ph.D. student with a deep interest in research methodology, educational statistics, and educational measurement. I am currently pursuing my doctorate at the University of North Texas in the Department of Educational Psychology, specializing in Research Methodology, Measurement, and Statistics. My academic journey is guided by my advisor, Dr. James Uanhoro.
